# Icon Component Analysis & Industry Standards

## üîç **Current Implementation Analysis**

### ‚úÖ **What's Working Well:**

1. **Material Symbols Integration**: Using Google's Material Symbols Outlined font
2. **Font Loading**: Proper font loading with fallback detection
3. **CSS Integration**: Material Symbols CSS classes properly configured
4. **Basic Accessibility**: Title attribute for tooltips

### ‚ùå **Issues Found & Fixed:**

1. **Missing Font in Test Pages**: Test HTML files lacked Material Symbols font import
2. **Limited Props**: Basic implementation with minimal customization options
3. **Accessibility Gaps**: Missing proper ARIA attributes
4. **No Size Control**: Hardcoded font size without flexibility
5. **No Style Variants**: No support for filled vs outlined variants

## üöÄ **Industry Standard Improvements Applied**

### **1. Enhanced Props Interface**
```tsx
export interface IconProps {
  children: string;           // Icon name
  className?: string;         // Custom CSS classes
  size?: 'xs' | 'sm' | 'md' | 'lg' | 'xl' | '2xl' | '3xl' | string;
  filled?: boolean;          // Filled vs outlined
  weight?: 100 | 200 | 300 | 400 | 500 | 600 | 700;
  opticalSize?: number;      // Material Symbols optical size
  ariaHidden?: boolean;      // Hide from screen readers
  ariaLabel?: string;        // Accessible label
}
```

### **2. Proper Size Mapping**
```tsx
const sizeMap = {
  xs: 'text-xs',    // 12px
  sm: 'text-sm',    // 14px
  md: 'text-base',  // 16px
  lg: 'text-lg',    // 18px
  xl: 'text-xl',    // 20px
  '2xl': 'text-2xl', // 24px
  '3xl': 'text-3xl'  // 30px
};
```

### **3. Font Variation Settings**
```tsx
const fontVariationSettings = `'FILL' ${filled ? 1 : 0}, 'wght' ${weight}, 'GRAD' 0, 'opsz' ${opticalSize}`;
```

### **4. Accessibility Compliance**
```tsx
const accessibilityProps = ariaHidden 
  ? { 'aria-hidden': true }
  : { 'aria-label': ariaLabel || children };
```

## üé® **Usage Examples (Industry Standard)**

### **1. Inline with Text (Automatic Sizing)**
```tsx
<p className="text-lg flex items-center gap-2">
  <Icon>info</Icon>
  <span>Informational Text</span>
</p>
```

### **2. Icon Buttons (Accessible)**
```tsx
<button 
  className="p-2.5 rounded-md hover:bg-bg-tertiary"
  aria-label="Open settings"
>
  <Icon size="lg">settings</Icon>
</button>
```

### **3. Decorative Icons (Hidden from Screen Readers)**
```tsx
<div className="flex items-center gap-2">
  <Icon ariaHidden={true}>star</Icon>
  <span>Premium Feature</span>
</div>
```

### **4. Custom Styling**
```tsx
<Icon 
  size="2xl" 
  weight={600} 
  filled={true}
  className="text-brand-orange"
  ariaLabel="Success indicator"
>
  check_circle
</Icon>
```

## üîß **Technical Implementation Details**

### **Font Loading Strategy**
```tsx
// Check if Material Symbols font is loaded
const isFontLoaded = document.fonts?.check('1em "Material Symbols Outlined"') || 
                    document.fonts?.check('1em Material Symbols Outlined') ||
                    true; // Fallback to true for now
```

### **CSS Integration**
```css
.material-symbols-outlined { 
  font-variation-settings: 'FILL' 0, 'wght' 400, 'GRAD' 0, 'opsz' 24 
}
```

### **HTML Structure**
```html
<link rel="stylesheet" href="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Material+Symbols+Outlined:opsz,wght,FILL,GRAD@24,400,0,0">
```
